message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't be serious with a 50/50 split. I'll give you a small consolation prize.
You're being stingy, but I'll give you a chance to make it up. This is my best offer so far.
You're trying to lowball me, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't think this is the end of it.
You're not willing to budge, so I'll try to make a more aggressive offer. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, but I'm not going to give in yet. This is my last 'generous' offer.
I'm not going to give up yet. I'll make one more aggressive offer. Take it or leave it.
You're running out of time, and I'm not getting any younger. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
I'm not going to give up. I'll take the last chance to make a final offer. This is it.
You're really pushing your luck now. This is my last stand, don't say I didn't warn you.
I'm not going to back down. I'll take the last chance to make a final offer. This is my all or nothing.
Fine, we'll play it your way. I'll take everything. It's been a pleasure playing with you, Alice.
